articles.author: Science X
articles.title: Deep dive on sea level rise: New modeling gives better predictions on Antarctic ice sheet melt - Phys.org
articles.description: Using historical records from around Australia, an international team of researchers have put forward the most accurate prediction to date of past Antarctic ice sheet melt, providing a more realistic forecast of future sea level rise.
